webhook.name: Discord Webhook
webhook.description:
The Discord Webhook URL to send messages to

How To: 
Server Settings > Integrations > Webhooks > New Webhook

webhookImageURL.name: Discord Image URL
webhookImageURL.description: The URL of the image to send with the Discord Webhook

showDungeonStartMessageToggle.name: Show Dungeon Started Message
showDungeonStartMessageToggle.description: Sends an embed to discord when a dungeon starts

dungeonStartWebhookMessage.name: Dungeon Start Webhook Message
dungeonStartWebhookMessage.description: Sets the message sent through the webhook when dungeon starts

showDungeonBossSpawnMessageToggle.name: Show Dungeon Boss Spawn Message
showDungeonBossSpawnMessageToggle.description: Sends an embed to discord when a dungeon boss spawns

dungeonBossSpawnWebhookMessage.name: Boss Spawn Webhook Message
dungeonBossSpawnWebhookMessage.description: Sets the message sent through the webhook when dungeon boss spawns

showDungeonClosingInMessageToggle.name: Show Dungeon Closing In Message
showDungeonClosingInMessageToggle.description: Sends an embed to discord when a dungeon is closing in

getDungeonClosingInMessage.name: Show Dungeon Closing Message
getDungeonClosingInMessage.description:
The message that gets sent to the client when a dungeon is closing

*NOTE: YOU NEED TO USE '&' COLOR CODES*

showDungeonBossSlainMessageToggle.name: Show Dungeon Boss Slain Message
showDungeonBossSlainMessageToggle.description: Sends an embed to discord when a dungeon boss is slain

dungeonBossSlainWebhookMessage.name: Boss Slain Webhook Message
dungeonBossSlainWebhookMessage.description: Sets the message sent through the webhook when dungeon dungeon boss is slain

getDungeonStartMessage.name: Dungeon Started Message
getDungeonStartMessage.description:
The message that gets sent to the client when a dungeon starts

*NOTE: YOU NEED TO USE '&' COLOR CODES*

getDungeonBossSpawnMessage.name: Dungeon Boss Spawn Message
getDungeonBossSpawnMessage.description:
The message that gets sent to the client when a dungeon boss spawns

*NOTE: YOU NEED TO USE '&' COLOR CODES*

getDungeonBossSlainMessage.name: Dungeon Boss Slain Message
getDungeonBossSlainMessage.description:
The message that gets sent to the client when a dungeon boss is slain

*NOTE: YOU NEED TO USE '&' COLOR CODES*
